main_task: Gather valid information on options for deactivating OD-SSB transmission from UE perspective.

task_1.content: Investigate the general options available for deactivating SSB from the UE perspective. This will involve searching for technical documents or standards that outline these options.
task_1.agent_role_description: The Communication Systems Researcher will explore and analyze technical documents related to SSB operations, focusing on options for deactivation from the UE perspective.
local_constraints: Focus on documents published within the last two years regarding SSB deactivation options.

task_2.content: Based on the findings from task_1, explore specific 3GPP standards related to OD-SSB and their implications for UE operation.
task_2.agent_role_description: The 3GPP Standards Specialist will review and interpret 3GPP standards documents, focusing on those that discuss OD-SSB and its operational parameters for UE.
local_constraints: Limit the search to 3GPP specifications relevant to SSB and UE operations.

task_3.content: Analyze the network performance implications of deactivating OD-SSB from the UE perspective, including efficiency and user experience metrics.
task_3.agent_role_description: The Network Performance Analyst will evaluate how deactivating OD-SSB affects overall network performance and user experience, using relevant performance metrics.
local_constraints: Focus on performance studies published in the last three years that address SSB deactivation.

task_4.content: Review any existing policies or regulations that may influence the implementation of OD-SSB deactivation, considering regulatory constraints and guidelines.
task_4.agent_role_description: The Regulatory Analyst will investigate policies and regulations that impact the implementation of OD-SSB deactivation, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
local_constraints: Search for regulatory documents from recognized telecommunications authorities.
